channel.title: Workout on Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Workout on Homepage

item.title: Crossfit
item.description: I started doing exercise classes recently, so it’s on my brain. It’s the first time I’ve ever done a class and it’s kicking my butt. I’m coming up on 40 soon, so I have to do some damage control if I want to keep up with my kids, and… oh damn, I’m doing it, aren’t I?
item.content:encoded: I started doing exercise classes recently, so it’s on my brain. It’s the first time I’ve ever done a class and it’s kicking my butt. I’m coming up on 40 soon, so I have to do some damage control if I want to keep up with my kids, and… oh damn, I’m doing it, aren’t I?
